root.message: The RATIONALE field for indicator 3-6-2, translated into en
root.data:
- The indicator is an important measure to assess maternal health after birth and the reduction in infant mortality. This indicator also provides indirect evidence on the ability to access reproductive health care services of young people, and especially unmarried young people often face many difficulties in accessing health care services. reproductive health.

- Provide basic data for the design of reproductive health education and communication activities and assessment of risks related to reproductive health among 10-19 year old girls.
